Calibration Class Reference

Reads an XML file containing the calibration parameters for the High-Sensitivity Mode. More...

Detailed Description

Reads an XML file containing the calibration parameters for the High-Sensitivity Mode.

Note:
Regression parameters were determined with "noise-temperature_calibration.py" Values could be tweaked manually if wear and tear changes the sensor's behavior

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructor that immediately imports the file "calibration_temperature_noise.xml"
